Introduction

84LY, pronounced as Eight Poly, was a six-member girl group signed under Universal Music Korea and Show M Entertainment. They debuted on September 29, 2012, with their sole mini album, Girls Secret Party. Unfortunately, the group disbanded in 2013 after only one year of activity.
